name: Russian Elmo
description:
DESCRIPTION

Russian Elmo is a game about Elmo being the president for 60 seconds before the world may go in a nuclear war, in those 60 seconds you, the player as elmo can do whatever you want, but be cautios cause your actions have consequences.

CAUTION

*caution "the game has loud sound effects, explosions and alcohol"

INPUT

Walk: WASD or ↑↓→ ←

Interact: E

Punch: LeftClick

Kiss: RightClick
